content: this is a sample document for the [[VAULT-TEC:vault]-TEC:[VAULT-TEC:vault]-tec] rag system. it contains information about fallout universe. [[VAULT-TEC:vault]-TEC:[VAULT-TEC:vault]-tec] is a pre-war company that designed and built the vaults. ## [[VAULT-TEC:vault]-TEC:[VAULT-TEC:vault]-tec] background [[VAULT-TEC:vault]-TEC:[VAULT-TEC:vault]-tec] corporation was a pre-war defense corporation which won the federal government contract to build underground fallout shelters called "vaults." these vaults were designed as shelters for the american population in case of a nuclear war. ## secret experiments however, most vaults were secretly designed to conduct social experiments on the dwellers. each [VAULT-TEC:vault] was built with a different social experiment.
